newsitem.title: ITALY: Italy 10-yr Btp yield spread vs Bund at fresh low.
newsitem.headline: Italy 10-yr Btp yield spread vs Bund at fresh low.

text.p: The ever-narrowing yield spread of the February 2007 Italian Btp closed in to 105 basis points over the 10-year Bund on Thursday, the latest in a succession of records.
The Feb07 Btp was 10 basis points up on the day at 101.20 with a yield of 6.70 percent by 1000 GMT.
The September future on LIFFE was six basis points up on the day at 135.08, below yesterday's record peak of 135.20.
